message.body: I'm going in August
Let's go together
can go to CO and then CA in early august/late july
meet you in CO and then maybe we can drive there together
just you and me? a road trip? we can fight a lot?
i bet mom & dad will offer to pay for gas
I think I have most of the month of August off
Ok my last summer class is July 15th
oh awesome
I could come to CO on the 16th
I should no for sure latee today or next week
ok
lets work around your schedule
i would love to be able to plan something for that time
Yeah i may not want you to Come until the end of July beginning of August cause I'll have finals but then we can spend a few days in co, a few days driving to ca and a week with grandpa
Basically take almost The whole month
ok great
YES
except I will need to work
I leave august 26 for london
oh i also have a wedding on august 22nd
so lets plan for the first two weeks in august
approx
Okay!! I think that's perfect
We are suppose to get an email really soon with our summer schedule
oh exciting
Wow what an amazing photo
Can I call soon?
Guys I look so good today
Like I love my outfit but nobody commented on it which I am so surprised about
I thought everyone would say they like it

Okay: The tentative last day of lecture classes is Friday, July 24. In summer 2014, labs extended beyond the last day of lecture classes. At this time, I am not aware of any academic requirements that you will have between the summer and fall terms (apart from the possibility of the lab extension). However, schedules can often change and sometimes students are required to complete clinical documents/trainings during traditional holiday/semester breaks. The fall semester will begin Monday, August 31.
that was in the email she sent
Hi!
